summary: An ordinance relating to the franchise granted to the Columbia & Puget Sound Railroad Company, a corporation, its successors and assigns, by Ordinance No. 9119, amending said ordinance to provide for changes in the franchise right of way occasioned by the construction and maintenance of the Alaskan Way Viaduct; specifically amending Section 2 thereof, with a view to providing for such changes; and providing for the acceptance by the Pacific Coast R.R. Co., successor in interest to the Columbia & Puget Sound Railroad Company, of said franchise as so modified.
